gothik (puranathama pulul wa lekhanagatha wa athi jarmanuka bhashawa, k ri. wa. 350 pamana), anek purana jarmanuka bhashawange karunu da athulath wa: wisheshayen ma purana ing risi (k ri. wa. 800-1000 pamana), purana usas jarmanu (k ri. wa. 750-1000 pamana) saha purana nors (k ri. wa. 1100-1300 pamana, k ri. wa. 200 ta diwa yana simitha purana lekhana da athulath).

kese namuth 2010 balayata pathwana rajapaksha yanu aduma tharamin chandrika wage prajathanthrawadi prathisanskarana gana wachikawa nikamata ho kathakala ayek nemeyi.wasara dahayakata pasu wasudewa nanayakkara "wamata bara" aanduwak hadanna yanne ewani ayek ekkayi.deshapalana thalaye widhayaka janadhipathidhuraya ahosi kirima nowa eeta thibena awama sima wana dhura kalaya darime simawa wage sima walata pawa payin gasana dakshinanshika swarupaye hasirim pennana,dan yudde iwarayi oyala awith hithe hatiyata bisnas karanna kiyala goliya dhanawadayata inwiteshan yawamin sitima swakiya aarthika prathipaththiya karagaththa,thamun telipromptarayen demala kathakarana nisa jathinge prashnaya wisadi athayi prasiddhiye prakasha karana wathman palakaya samaga eka pelata hitaganna nanayakkara hethema "pragathashili" nayakayek lesa hadunwaddi kanagatuwak wenuwata tharamaka hasyayak athiwenawa.
